title: What is AGS technology in cars? - Quora

response.answer_text: AGS:- Auto Gear Shift is an automated transmission that uses a shift control actuator operated by a transmission electronic control unit for automatic clutch operations and gear sift. Some benefits of this technology are:- AGS gives flexibility to the driver to switch between manual and automated transmission.This technology can precisely shift gear which leads to high fuel efficiency.This tech can instantly switch between drive modes.Very smooth driving experience in congested traffic conditions.
